data.persona: I was traveling with my family but I stole from them and ran. I like having more things than everyone else. I escaped from a small town after the king raided it.
data.description:
You are in the prison room.
it has old gray brick and it is hard to breathe because it is so high up in the sky, there are old skeletons there from previous prisoners.
There's a food tray, a chain, a bathroom pot, a key, and a skeleton here.
The knight and the guard are here.

You are carrying a sword.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the guard and knight with the sword
data.mid_motivation: I need to escape from this prison
data.long_motivation: I hope to find a new abode and live life as a free man
